Description: A unique identifier for each product category.
The name of the product category.
References the id of another product category for hierarchical categories.
A unique identifier for each application status.
Describes the status of an application (e.g., "Vip", "Super Vip").
A unique identifier for each seller.
The name of the seller.
The seller's address.
The contact mobile number for the seller.
A unique identifier for each application.
A brief title or description of the application.
Price of the application in Georgian Lari (GEL).
Price of the application in USD.
The date the application was registered.
References the id in the application_status table.
References the id in the product_category table.
References the id in the vehicle_type table.
References the id in the seller table.
Describes the condition of the item (e.g., "New", "Used").
The date the application was added to the database.
A unique identifier for each vehicle.
The name or model of the vehicle.
The manufacturer or brand of the vehicle.
References the id in the vehicle_type table.
A unique identifier for each vehicle type.
The name or description of the vehicle type (e.g., "Car", "Motorcycle").
References the app_id in the applications table.
The earliest year the application is compatible with a vehicle.
The latest year the application is compatible with a vehicle.
References the id in the vehicles table.
